summary: The customer was interested in Contoso Wireless' product internet and the agent provided them with more information about it. The product internet offers speeds of up to 100 Mbps and unlimited data for $59.99 per month plus taxes and fees. The agent also offered the customer an upgrade to the Platinum plan, which offers speeds of up to 200 Mbps for $79.99 per month plus taxes and fees. The customer was happy with this plan and the agent was able to help them sign up for it right away.
